column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you are at all interested in going to the Art Institute more than once a year
column2: it makes total financial sense. The member ship is $70-80
column3: which seems steep initially. But think of this
column4: you and one other person can go to the museum anytime you'd like and garner free entrance to all special exhibits. Plus
column5: what they don't tell you is that there is a sweet Member's Only Lounge within the museum to get a cup of Joe and have a loungy break during your visit. Plus
column6: there are lots of Member's Perks that you find out about in the two-monthly newsletter-- early admittance to exhibits
